snippet.title: Marvel's THE BLACK CAT Trailer Concept - Netflix | Amber Heard, Vincent D'Onofrio
snippet.description:
Non-profit, FAN-MADE trailer. No copyright infringement intended.

I've been meaning to do a #BlackCat trailer for a while but nothing seemed to work. She's a favourite #SpiderMan villain of mine and could easily have her own Netflix series thanks to her ties to Kingpin and the Defenders... After revisiting and revamping, with some new material, I finally managed to complete the project! I hope you like it (and her) as much as I do.

The plot would be:
Like in the comics, her father's a master thief. She follows suit and her criminal activity peaks interest from the Kingpin. After various cat-and-mouse pursuit that sees her captured, she makes a deal to undergo experimentation (gaining her famous 'bad luck' powers).The finale would see her attempt to bring down the Kingpin with these new abilities, regaining her freedom in the process.

Black Cat/Felicia Hardy - Amber Heard
Kingpin/Wilson Fisk - Vincent D'Onofrio
Spider-Man/Peter Parker - I only included a costumed clip so it could basically be anybody... we don't need to see his face anyway.


Check out my other trailers and subscribe for more.

Enjoy!
